## TeamsBotInstallation.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Constructor

<b>Signature:</b>


|  --- | --- | --- |

It's recommended to get bot installations from , instead of using this constructor.
